SELECT ce.serviceAttitude, ce.openid, ce.doctorid, ce.createtime, ce.content, ce.dissatisfied, su.name as doctorName, su.email, su.phone, sa.nickname FROM customerEvaluation ce LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ce.doctorId = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_doctor sd ON su.id = sd.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_attention sa ON ce.openid = sa.openid WHERE serviceAttitude = '1' AND DATE_FORMAT(ce.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{fromDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY ce.createtime

SELECT ce.serviceAttitude, ce.openid, ce.doctorid, ce.createtime, ce.content, ce.redpacket, su.name as doctorName, su.phone, sa.nickname FROM customerEvaluation ce LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ce.doctorId LEFT JOIN sys_doctor sd ON sd.sys_user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_attention sa ON sa.openid = ce.openid WHERE serviceAttitude in ('3','5') AND ce.payStatus IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(ce.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{fromDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY ce.createtime
